method.name: angle_to_vector2
method.description: Returns a directional vector from the given orientation angle. This assumes orientation for 2D agents or 3D agents that are upright and rotate around the Y axis.

method.name: clampedv3
method.description: Returns the vector with its length capped to limit.

method.name: to_vector2
method.description: Returns a vector2 with vector's x and y components.

method.name: to_vector3
method.description: Returns a vector3 with vector's x and y components and 0 in z.

method.name: vector2_to_angle
method.description: Returns an angle in radians between the positive X axis and the vector.

method.name: vector3_to_angle
method.description: Returns an angle in radians between the positive X axis and the vector. This assumes orientation for 3D agents that are upright and rotate around the Y axis.
